title: Zapitrinantopik
author: Zapitrinantopik
content: I am looking for some workers to resell my services.My services are:‚Ä¢ dextools trending ‚Ä¢ cmc trending ‚Ä¢ cg trending ‚Ä¢ cmc listing ‚Ä¢ cg listing‚Ä¢ poocoin trending ‚Ä¢ pinksale trending ‚Ä¢ crypto.com trending ‚Ä¢ billboards ‚Ä¢ influencers/footballers‚Ä¢ exchange listings ‚Ä¢ partnership with big tokens‚Ä¢ team of developers‚Ä¢ chart expert (25K/weekly)‚Ä¢ can also be a marketing manager and help with all my services dirt cheap, tactics and experience (25K/weekly)¬†Dm me if you are interested https://t.me/Mootico

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Then create a signature campaign for your services for more participation to the services. Because you need to advertise your services and make a caption of a personal text which can capture all the services in one phrase.

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: Or search a serious website where you can promote one or some services.I have one but I am not sure if your services fits the audience. We should discuss that.

comments.author: Zapitrinantopik
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on June 29, 2023, 06:46:30 PMThen create a signature campaign for your services for more participation to the services. Because you need to advertise your services and make a caption of a personal text which can capture all the services in one phrase. thanks for advice üëç

comments.author: Zapitrinantopik
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on June 29, 2023, 06:49:59 PMOr search a serious website where you can promote one or some services.I have one but I am not sure if your services fits the audience. We should discuss that. for now i think these employees are more effective than alls cause in telegram crypto space somethings not working like that

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Zapitrinantopik on June 29, 2023, 06:51:47 PMQuote from: Freedom4All on June 29, 2023, 06:49:59 PMOr search a serious website where you can promote one or some services.I have one but I am not sure if your services fits the audience. We should discuss that. for now i think these employees are more effective than alls cause in telegram crypto space somethings not working like thatYou don't need to create separate replies because you can quote both posts and reply them in a single response.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Zapitrinantopik on June 29, 2023, 06:00:55 PMI am looking for some workers to resell my services.My services are:‚Ä¢ chart expert (25K/weekly)‚Ä¢ can also be a marketing manager and help with all my services dirt cheap, tactics and experience (25K/weekly)Can you explain this a bit, 25k weekly?Do you charge 25k (I assume dollars) weekly for these services?Quote from: Agbe on June 29, 2023, 06:46:30 PMThen create a signature campaign for your services for more participation to the services. Because you need to advertise your services and make a caption of a personal text which can capture all the services in one phrase.Mate, you need to calm down with signature campaign power. It is not the only way and it is certainly not the peak of marketing.Quote from: Freedom4All on June 29, 2023, 06:49:59 PMOr search a serious website where you can promote one or some services.I have one but I am not sure if your services fits the audience. We should discuss that.Can you stop spamming topics on the forum by offering ad space on your site?

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: What¬¥s wrong or unethical about that?Serious question.People recommend me to explore the forum to try to find the business that might fit what I seek.So, I don¬¥t see the problem when I am asking here for some more information. Sorry, don¬¥t want to be rude but I think I do not spam here. Can¬¥t see how. I follow advices from reputable members.I can have an understand on you how you might feel as you have seen a lot happening on this forum. So no problem. But I do not spam.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 29, 2023, 08:32:47 PMQuote from: Zapitrinantopik on June 29, 2023, 06:00:55 PMI am looking for some workers to resell my services.My services are:‚Ä¢ chart expert (25K/weekly)‚Ä¢ can also be a marketing manager and help with all my services dirt cheap, tactics and experience (25K/weekly)Can you explain this a bit, 25k weekly?Do you charge 25k (I assume dollars) weekly for these services?Since the OP said that he is looking for the workers so this means he won't charge the workers but instead he will pay the workers 25000 weekly. This is what is my understanding and what it suggest from that text written by him. However I don't think it will be 25K$ weekly as it is too much amount.Quote from: Freedom4All on June 29, 2023, 09:17:52 PMWhat¬¥s wrong or unethical about that?Serious question.People recommend me to explore the forum to try to find the business that might fit what I seek.So, I don¬¥t see the problem when I am asking here for some more information. Sorry, don¬¥t want to be rude but I think I do not spam here. Can¬¥t see how. I follow advices from reputable members.I can have an understand on you how you might feel as you have seen a lot happening on this forum. So no problem. But I do not spam. Don't get emotional, you are not spamming and it's your right to initiate a signature campaign for your services or hire the workers. Please be clear in your stance as will you be giving 25000 to the one whom you hire, what is the criteria of them to be selected and will they be given this amount to the one selected if they are able to sale your services or it will be given even if they do the marketing thing but unable to make sales.

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: That post about "25k" was not mine. (Quote from: Zapitrinantopik on June 29, 2023, 18:00:55)Haha, I¬¥m not emotional and crying at my desktop I remember when I came back here to not post do much or try to defend yourself. If you are legit, people will know it fast enough. And yet I wrote more here then on my own website in 4,5 years! :D

comments.author: initim
comments.body: You need to create awareness for people to apply, if it is genuine. simple

Because you need to advertise your services and make a caption of a personal text which can capture all the services in one phrase.Mate, you need to calm down with signature campaign power. It is not the only way and it is certainly not the peak of marketing.Quote from: Freedom4All on June 29, 2023, 06:49:59 PMOr search a serious website where you can promote one or some services.I have one but I am not sure if your services fits the audience. We should discuss that.Can you stop spamming topics on the forum by offering ad space on your site? Likely yes i will help with my services to keep project hype and plan for weeks and work on it
